example.text: Public health policy should never have been a substitution for US immigration policy. The GOP’s #HR2 Child Deportation Act fails to provide a serious solution while introducing cruel measures to vilify & punish vulnerable immigrants & asylum seekers. [[url]]

You cannot have a big-league economy with little league infrastructure. So far, the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law has delivered $4.3 billion in funding for Washington state with 340+ specific projects identified for funding. #InfrastructureWorks [[url]]
